tool_description: Managing user accounts and a Graph API for managing groups membership, and content that exists within your instance.
name: FacebookWorkplaceGraph
title: FacebookWorkplaceGraph

api_list.name: addGroupToCommunity
api_list.description: Add a new group to a community

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

optional_parameters.name: privacy
optional_parameters.description: The privacy setting of the group. Possible values: OPEN, CLOSED, SECRET. Default CLOSED

api_list.name: addMemberToGroup
api_list.description: Add a member to a group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: createGroupEvent
api_list.description: Create a new Event in a group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: createGroupPost
api_list.description: Post into a group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: deleteMemberFromGroup
api_list.description: Remove a member from a group. Removing the last member from a group will schedule that group for deletion.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: deleteMemberInboxMessage
api_list.description: Delete a specific message in a member's inbox (requires a member's impersonate token)

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getCommunityGroups
api_list.description: Get a list of all groups for a community

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getCommunityMembers
api_list.description: Get a list of all members for a community

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getGroupDocs
api_list.description: Get group docs

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getGroupMembers
api_list.description: Get group members

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getGroupPosts
api_list.description: Get group posts

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getMemberConversations
api_list.description: Get conversations for a member including messages and attachments

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getMemberEvents
api_list.description: Get a member's events

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getPostComments
api_list.description: Get the comments from a post

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getSingleCommunity
api_list.description: Get main information about community

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getSingleGroup
api_list.description: Get main information about group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getSingleMember
api_list.description: Get main information about member

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: getSinglePost
api_list.description: Get post main content

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: setMemberAsGroupAdmin
api_list.description: Promote a member to admin of a group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: tagUserInGroupPost
api_list.description: Tag a user in a group post

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace

api_list.name: unsetGroupAdmin
api_list.description: Demote an admin to member of a group

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Facebook Workplace
